name: He Hates the Flash
description:
A game made for the Weekly Game Jam #144, "In The Dark"

The game takes place in an abandoned camp of some sort. You are there to document recent events that have occurred here. You have heard the reports of the deaths in this area, but nobody knows why. Some dark and dithered images have shown up, usually resembling a dark figure with inhuman proportions, but they are presumed to be a hoax. 

Controls:

- E to interact

- Hold RMB to aim

- LMB while aiming to either take a picture or throw a bottle

- LSHIFT to sprint

Tips:

- Your footsteps make noise.

- He hates the camera flash.

- Starting the generator involves some interact timing.

- Figuring out the map helps immensely.

- Sometimes doors can be hard to find when they are unlit.

Info:

Worked on by a team of 3.

No pre-existing assets used (except sounds).
